title: THEY LISTENED! GRAVELORD AZIR IS A THING!

embed.description: The PBE has been updated! In addition to new skins and other content we also have our first look at Illaoi! Continue reading for more information! ( Warning: PBE Content is tentative and iterative - what you see may not reflect what eventually gets pushed to live servers! Manage your expectations accordingly.

body: I don't own or play azir.... and I love this skin

replies.body:
Glad you like him! ^-^ 

We had this dude in development for a bit, but when we decided on Zombie/Slayers for this holiday, we felt that Gravelord Azir didn't quite match with the thematic, which is why he's coming out after that particular batch of skins. *It was really hard not to say anything when everyone was upset that he didn't show up around Halloween.*
Its like Azir joined the Shadow Isles {{champion:268}}
They are deleting Yorick at the same time this skin comes out. Rework complete!
